entity.name: The White House
entity.description: Conversation from and about the White House, both as a destination and as political voice

text:
@steve_vladeck @VP @WSJ This is why the WH wants to control Covid-19 data directly. 
It’s also why we desperately need to have local investigative reporters. Without locally driven transparency efforts coupled w State gov & hospital admins willing to buck the Trump WH-we’ll be in the dark on Covid-19.
